instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no green light after charged to 100%
threads.message:
liquid damaged i think,

initially.....laptop can start with battery, .laptop can start without battery, laptop can charge battery, laptop's can go orange while charging. laptop can go green without battery.
but after i charged the battery to 100%, the magsagfe's light stay orange and doesnt go green, and when i unplug then replug magsafe then show no light on charger.

now i get a very dimmed green light on charger with battery. i can't start with charger with no battery connected.

coconutbattery can see battery info but cant see power adapter info.


[B]bad smc?[/B]


resistance on <CHIP>U7000</CHIP> between pins 17-18 is  3.2ohms
and 27-28 is 20.1ohms

Resistance to GND on PPBUS is OL

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no green light after charged to 100%
threads.message:
mmm, corrosion on the magsafe board.

i;ll return to this thread when i have new magsafe boards instock.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no green light after charged to 100%
threads.message: Willing to bet it's the magsafe board.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no green light after charged to 100%
threads.message:
yes it is :)

i've found a spare magsafe board on top of the microscope. i've compared resistances.

i found adapter sense pin has resistance to ground.


laptop is fixed.
